name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReadTime Pro - Quickly Find Out How Long It Takes to Read

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReadTime Pro instantly calculates and displays the estimated reading time, allowing you to manage your reading schedule effectively

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover how long it will take you to read any article or web page with just one click! ReadTime Pro instantly calculates and displays the estimated reading time, allowing you to manage your reading schedule effectively.

Key Features:
☆ Instant Reading Time Calculation: Get accurate reading time estimates in seconds!
☆ User-Friendly Interface: Simply click the extension icon for instant results.
☆ No Configuration Required: Works right out of the box for any web page you visit.
☆ Compatible with All Websites: ReadTime Pro seamlessly integrates into your browsing experience.

Empower yourself to read smarter with ReadTime Pro—your reading time, simplified.
